title: A New Year's Surprise
description: Alex is hiding out during a New Year's Eve party; she's hiding from her well-meaning friends, who are always playing matchmaker. But after a dismal engagement, Alex isn't sure she wants to be matched up with anyone.Michael's friends are always fixing him up as well, and after several unfortunate dates, not only is he a little gun-shy, he's also earned a reputation as a 'love 'em and leave 'em' kind of guy. But if the truth were told, Michael would happily settle down...if only his friends would match him up with the right woman!
author: Lisa J. Crane
